name: accursed
description: blessed extensions, typings, elements, frameworks, documentation and apps

scripts.prettier: npx ts-refactor organizeImports "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*" --dontAsk && npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*"
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && npm run docs-readme-toc   && npm run docs-blessed-md && npm run docs-blessed && npm run docs-accursed-md && npm run docs-accursed
scripts.docs-accursed-md: D=docs/api/accursed-md && rm -rf $D; mkdir $D ; npx typedoc  --options typedoc.ts  --theme markdown --out $D
scripts.docs-accursed: D=docs/api/accursed && rm -rf $D; mkdir -p $D ; npm run build && npx typedoc   --options typedoc.ts  --out $D
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test
scripts.all-docs: npm run all && npm run docs

author: Sebastian Gurin
